entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: Gregorovitch is a person who claims to have had an item stolen from him. He is described as having been read by Voldemort's mind and having seen the young thief through his memories.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who is able to read minds and has a history with Gregorovitch. He is described as seeming to hustle through Gregorovitch's eyes into his memories.

entities.name: the young thief
entities.description: The young thief is a person who stole an item from Gregorovitch many years ago. He is described as looking familiar to Harry and having fired a curse at Gregorovitch before jumping out of sight.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is trying to remember the young thief's face and figure out why he looks so familiar. He is described as wishing he could have another glimpse of the laughing boy's face.

relationships.description: Voldemort read Gregorovitch's mind and saw the young thief through his memories.
Harry is trying to remember the young thief's face, which he wishes he could have another glimpse of.
